title: A Day in the Life of a Woman
brief_description: A series narrated by Judy Morris and introduced by Franca Arena, depicting the diversity in the lives of seven individual women of the Asian and Australian region. Each episode is devoted to exploring their roles in the home, at work and within their own cultures.
